verses.verse: Even to day <S%H3117><s%> is my complaint <S%H7879><s%> bitter <S%H4805><s%>: my stroke <S%H3027><s%> is heavier <S%H3513><s%> than my groaning <S%H585><s%>.
Oh that <S%H5414><s%> I knew <S%H3045><s%> where I might find <S%H4672><s%> him <S%H935><s%>! that I might come even to his seat <S%H8499><s%>!
I would order <S%H6186><s%> my cause <S%H4941><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H4390><s%>, and fill my mouth <S%H6310><s%> with arguments <S%H8433><s%>.
I would know <S%H3045><s%> the words <S%H4405><s%> which he would answer <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H995><s%>, and understand what he would say unto me <S%H559><s%>.
Will he plead <S%H7378><s%> against <S%H5978><s%> me with his great <S%H7230><s%> power <S%H3581><s%>? No <S%H7760><s%>; but he would put strength in me.
There the righteous <S%H3477><s%> might dispute <S%H3198><s%> with him <S%H6403><s%>; so should I be delivered for ever <S%H5331><s%> from my judge <S%H8199><s%>.
Behold <S%H1980><s%>, I go forward <S%H6924><s%>, but he is not there <S%H268><s%>; and backward, but I cannot perceive him <S%H995><s%>:

On the left hand <S%H8040><s%>, where he does work <S%H6213><s%>, but I cannot behold <S%H2372><s%> him <S%H5848><s%>: he hides himself on the right hand <S%H3225><s%>, that I cannot see him <S%H7200><s%>:
But he knows <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> that I take <S%H5978><s%>: when he has tried <S%H974><s%> me <S%H3318><s%>, I shall come forth as gold <S%H2091><s%>.
My foot <S%H7272><s%> has held <S%H270><s%> his steps <S%H838><s%>, his way <S%H1870><s%> have I kept <S%H8104><s%>, and not declined <S%H5186><s%>.

Neither have I gone back <S%H4185><s%> from the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of his lips <S%H8193><s%>; I have esteemed <S%H6845><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%> more than my necessary food <S%H2706><s%>.
But he is in one <S%H259><s%> mind <S%H7725><s%>, and who can turn him <S%H5315><s%>? and what his soul desires <S%H183><s%>, even that he does <S%H6213><s%>.
For he performs <S%H7999><s%> the thing that is appointed <S%H2706><s%> for me <S%H7227><s%>: and many such things are with him <S%H2007><s%>.
Therefore am I troubled <S%H926><s%> at his presence <S%H6440><s%>: when I consider <S%H995><s%>, I am afraid of him <S%H6342><s%>.
For God <S%H410><s%> makes my heart <S%H3820><s%> soft <S%H7401><s%>, and the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> troubles me <S%H926><s%>:
Because I was not cut off <S%H6789><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the darkness <S%H2822><s%>, neither has he covered <S%H3680><s%> the darkness <S%H652><s%> from my face <S%H6440><s%>.
